wikipedia_page.main: John Roberts  (born 1857) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team between 1879 and 1883, playing 7 matches and scoring 1 goal. He played his first match on 7 April 1879 against Scotland and his last match on 3 February 1883 against England.At club level he played on the Left Wing for Corwen and Berwyn Rangers.
